meanings.sent1: She was overkeen to start the race, jumping up and down with excitement.
meanings.sent2: The overkeen student always raised their hand first in class.
meanings.sent3: His overkeenness to help sometimes led to him tripping over his own feet.
meanings.sent4: The overkeen puppy chased its tail in circles, never tiring of the game.
meanings.sent5: The overkeen fan painted their face in team colors for every game, rain or shine.

meanings.definition: to be too eager or enthusiastic
meanings.sent1: Try not to overkeen your friends into going to the party if they're not interested.
meanings.sent2: She tends to overkeen about new projects, often overwhelming her colleagues.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally overkeened his way into organizing the entire event single-handedly.
meanings.sent4: The children overkeen to play outside, rushed out without their jackets in the cold.
meanings.sent5: The coach warned the team not to overkeen during warm-up to avoid exhaustion before the game.
